#summary Planned Development for 1.1

= Google API Library for GWT Version 1.1 Development Plan =

=== New API Support (Design Docs) ===
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/wiki/MapsAPIDesign Google Maps API] ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=8 #8])
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/wiki/AJAXSearchAPIDesign Google AJAX Search API] ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=9 #9])

=== Fixes ===
  * Method to test for Gears availability ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=1 #1])
  * Set mime types and end of line properties on all files ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=2 #2])
  * Update to latest gears_init.js ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=5 #5])
  * Bugs with !ResourceStore exception messages ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=7 #7])
  * !ResourceStore URL capture does not work in GWT's hosted mode browser on Windows ([http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/issues/detail?id=10 #10])
